121.content: So we enter the cult classic of kids fighting adults with 2x4 technology. Well, I better dust off my slingshot...
121.title: Introductions

125.content:
Harry Potter eh?

Alright then...

May I offer up some ideas that involve a certain wizard that I have been working on named Alexander Prescott?

________________________

Alexander Prescott is a young wizard who attended Hogwarts from a time before Harry Potter's arrival to the school of witchcraft and wizardry. He was sorted into the Ravenclaw House even though showing the traits of each other house. Unfortunately, his family name was tarnished by Alex's older brother Jacob who firstly got expelled at Hogwarts for rulebreaking and looking for the fabled cursed vaults that were rumored to be within the halls of the great school and then ran away from home sometime after that. Alexander was then moved to live with his grandparents until school started as his parents went out of their way to find their eldest son who seemed to be going down a very dark road.
125.title: Harry Potter Universe

1254.content: Deeper down the rabbit hole we go...
1254.title: More Ideas

info.brief_description: A collection of stories that are either fanfictions or harem-based.
info.description:
Since I am too lazy to create individual interactive stories for each and every one...

Each story will be different from each other and based on the fandom or the world that the harem is based on and I will put the list of characters and the name of the story attached with each one.

I hope you enjoy.
